ruleArticles:
<js>
var source=source.getVariable()
if(baseUrl.match(/search/)){
  if(String(source)==0){
	  java.longToast("当前未输入搜索内容！")
	  }else{
	  	url="https://sigu.cc/search/-------------.html?"+"wd="+source+"&submit=";
	  	java.log(url)
	  html=java.ajax(url);
	  //java.log(html)
	  
	  if(html.match(/频繁操作/)){
	  	
	  	java.longToast("搜索间隔3秒，请不要频繁操作哦！");
	  	java.startBrowserAwait(url,"等待跳转返回")
	  	
	  	}else if(html.match(/请输入验证码/)){
	  //java.log("输入验证码")
	  
yzm=java.getVerificationCode("https://sigu.cc/index.php/verify/index.html?");
	  		verifi_url="http://sigu.cc/index.php/ajax/verify_check?type=search&verify="+yzm+","+JSON.stringify({"cookie":cookie})
	  		
	  		data=java.ajax(verifi_url)
	  		
	  	 java.log(verifi_url);
	  	
	  	cookie=java.getCookie(verifi_url);
	  	
	  java.log(cookie);
	  
	  url=url+","+JSON.stringify({"cookie":cookie});
	  	
	  java.log(url)
	  	html=java.ajax(url)
	  	}
	  java.setContent(html)
	  list=java.getElement("id.searchList@li")
	  	}
	 }else{
	 	list=java.getElement("class.myui-vodlist__box")
	 	}
	 	list
</js>
ruleContent:
{{@@class.nav nav-tabs active@a@html}}
{{@@class.myui-content__list@html}} @js: result = result.replace(/([^<]+)<\/a><\/li>/g,'').replace(//g,'')
